column4: Hey guys, how do i get into /(filesystem) in the terminal, I'm trying to delete the CD shortcut using, sudo rm cdrom
Does the terminal recognize /(File System) I from it i can go into directories but it cant find the cdrom shortcut in, sudo rm cdrom
thats because unless u have an alias    cdrom   is just a word not a dir,.
if its there then the command would be    sudo rm /cdrom
yes o to synaptic and search for   sudo-nautilus   i believe
